lastSession.summary: v6.0.1: Added v6 upgrade cleanup to setup.sh. migrate_to_v6() removes worktrees/, handoffs.json, stale worktree.md, and pendingHandoffs from target projects on upgrade. Removed all pendingHandoffs references from commands.
completedTasks: Added migrate_to_v6() function to setup.sh for automatic cleanup on upgrade
Removed pendingHandoffs from agents/context.json template and live file
Cleaned handoffs references from init.sh, start.md, checkpoint.md, setup.md
nextSteps: Run /claude-harness:setup on a test project to verify v6 migration
Test /flow with Agent Teams specialist team

recentChanges: v6.0.1: v6 upgrade cleanup - migrate_to_v6() removes worktrees, handoffs, stale commands
